title: Retrieve data from Creatio using OAuth 2.0 authorization and OData 4
content_markdown:
Version: 8.0
On this page
Level: intermediate
To implement the example:
**Step 1** : Set up the integration of a third-party app with Creatio using Identity Service. Read more >>>
**Step 2** : Retrieve a `Bearer` token. Read more >>>
**Step 3** : Retrieve data from Creatio. Read more >>>
Example
Retrieve the list of all accounts from the **Accounts** section. Use OAuth 2.0 authorization and OData 4 protocol to integrate the app with Creatio.
Response
Status: 200 OK  
{

This example uses Postman to test requests.
## 1\. Set up the integration of a third-party app with Creatio using Identity Service​
1. **Set up the Identity Service**. Instructions: [Set up the Identity Service](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=2466).
2. **Set up the OAuth 2.0 authorization**. Instructions: [Set up the OAuth 2.0 authorization](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=2467).
3. **Make sure the Identity Service is running**. Instructions: [Set up the integration of a third-party app with Creatio using Identity Service](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=15058&anchor=title-2830-1) (step 3).
## 2\. Retrieve a Bearer token​
Instructions: [Retrieve a `Bearer` token](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=15058&anchor=title-2830-2).
You can now integrate third-party apps or web services with Creatio using OAuth 2.0 authorization. Authorize all external requests to Creatio using the `Bearer` token.
## 3\. Retrieve data from Creatio​
1. **Create a request** to retrieve data using OData 4.
1. Add a request to the collection. Instructions: [Adding requests to the collection](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=15453&anchor=title-1418-2).
2. Fill out the request parameters.
Parameter| Parameter description| Parameter value  
---|---|---  
Request method| | GET  
Request URL| The URL of the Creatio instance to retrieve data.| <http://mycreatio.com/0/odata/Account>  
Request
GET http://mycreatio.com/0/odata/Account  
3. Save the request.
2. **Set up the authorization**. Instructions: [Retrieve data from Creatio](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=15058&anchor=title-2830-3) (step 2).
3. **Execute the request**.
**As a result** , you will retrieve the list of all accounts. [View result >>>](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?ver=8.0&id=15054&anchor=view-result)
* * *
## Resources​
[Creatio API documentation](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/10204500/SztHX5Qb?version=latest)

callouts.html:
Retrieve the list of all accounts from the Accounts section. Use OAuth 2.0 authorization and OData 4 protocol to integrate the app with Creatio.

headings.text: Retrieve data from Creatio using OAuth 2.0 authorization and OData 4
1. Set up the integration of a third-party app with Creatio using Identity Service​

parameters.name: Request URL
parameters.type: The URL of the Creatio instance to retrieve data.
